Description:

The new part of the popular simulator dictator again returns you to the remote island nation of Tropico ! Edit the dynasty with its early colonial times to the 21st century and beyond. You have a completely new test , to learn new ways to trade and research and discover new technologies . And also, for the first time in history a series Tropico - the opportunity to play four in multiplayer and co-op mode !

2. Copy the contents of a folder Crack (corresponding to the desired language games) in a folder with a game 
3. Play.
